package pjk;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class star {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.print("수 입력 : ");
		int num = sc.nextInt();
		for(int i = 1; i<=num; i++) {
			for(int j = 1; j<=i; j++) {
				System.out.print('*');
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
		
	}
	
}
